definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

sentences.english: Blitzing while you jog is a great way to increase your speed.
sentences.chinese: 在慢跑時閃擊，是提高你的速度的極好方法。

sentences.english: The quick succession of strokes is what causes the lightning channel to flicker.
sentences.chinese: 接二連三的快速閃擊，則是使閃電通道閃爍的主因。

sentences.english: It is the equivalent of a coast-to-coast marketing blitz.
sentences.chinese: 這是一次全美範圍對等的閃擊式營銷。

sentences.english: I have been asked how I felt in the Blitz.
sentences.chinese: 有人問我閃擊戰期間的感受。

sentences.english: Both natural and man-made lightning flashes are usually composed of several strokes.
sentences.chinese: 自然及人造的閃電，通常皆由數個閃擊所構成。
